com.netflix.genie.web.jobs.workflow

Interface WorkflowTask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationTask, ClusterTask, CommandTask, GenieBaseTask, InitialSetupTask, JobFailureAndKillHandlerLogicTask, JobKickoffTask, JobTask

    public interface WorkflowTask
    Interface that defines a task in a workflow.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeTask(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> context)
      Execute the task.

    • Method Detail

      • executeTask

        void executeTask(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> context)
          throws GenieException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Execute the task.
        Parameters:
        context - Information needed to execute the task.
        Throws:
        GenieException - if there is an error.
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing to the disk.
